A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A profoundly stupid movie\, filled with the dumbest characters and plot this side of Transformers. This movie is a hateful destruction of a once beloved franchise. Even more damning; it leaves nothing to look forward to in the future. Everything that the characters have fought for\, built\, or accomplished in the past 7 movies has been torn down\, smashed to pieces\, and burned to nothing. Star Wars may not be dead\, but my love for it certainly is.
